mapper.select: SELECT ADMIN_EMAIL FROM TBL_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_EMAIL = #{adminEmail} AND ADMIN_PASSWORD = #{adminPassword}
SELECT ID, ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_NOTICE_NUMBER, ADMIN_NOTICE_TITLE, ADMIN_NOTICE_CONTENT, ADMIN_NOTICE_VIEW, ADMIN_NOTICE_WRITER, ADMIN_NOTICE_DATE FROM TBL_ADMIN_NOTICE ORDER BY ADMIN_NOTICE_DATE DESC
SELECT ID, ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_NOTICE_NUMBER, ADMIN_NOTICE_TITLE, ADMIN_NOTICE_CONTENT, ADMIN_NOTICE_VIEW, ADMIN_NOTICE_WRITER, ADMIN_NOTICE_DATE FROM TBL_ADMIN_NOTICE WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ADMIN_NOTICE ( ID, ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_NOTICE_NUMBER, ADMIN_NOTICE_TITLE, ADMIN_NOTICE_CONTENT, ADMIN_NOTICE_VIEW, ADMIN_NOTICE_WRITER, ADMIN_NOTICE_DATE ) VALUES ( ADMIN_NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{adminId}, #{adminNoticeNumber}, #{adminNoticeTitle}, #{adminNoticeContent}, #{adminNoticeView}, #{adminNoticeWriter}, DEFAULT )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_ADMIN_NOTICE SET ADMIN_NOTICE_TITLE = #{adminNoticeTitle}, ADMIN_NOTICE_CONTENT = #{adminNoticeContent}, ADMIN_NOTICE_VIEW = #{adminNoticeView}, ADMIN_NOTICE_WRITER = #{adminNoticeWriter}, ADMIN_NOTICE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ID = #{id}
